data.title: Madrid time zone
data.meta_description: Upcoming time change dates in Spain, Madrid
data.text:
The clocks go forward by one hour at 01:00 AM on 31 March 2024, jumping from 01:00 AM to 02:00 AM (so called "spring forward"). This marks the beginning of CEST. There's more daylight in the evenings and less in the mornings.

The clocks 'fall back' by one hour at 01:00 AM on 27 October 2024, changing from 01:00 AM to 12:00 AM. This marks the end of Daylight Saving Time (CEST), returning to Standard Time (CET).
